name: @cloudflare/sandbox
description: A sandboxed environment for running commands

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsup src/*.ts --outDir dist --dts --sourcemap --format esm
scripts.docker:local: npm run build -w @repo/sandbox-container && cd ../.. && docker build -f packages/sandbox/Dockerfile -t cloudflare/sandbox-test:$npm_package_version .
scripts.docker:publish: cd ../.. && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f packages/sandbox/Dockerfile -t cloudflare/sandbox:$npm_package_version --push .
scripts.docker:publish:beta: cd ../.. && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f packages/sandbox/Dockerfile -t cloudflare/sandbox:$npm_package_version-beta --push .
scripts.test: vitest run --config vitest.unit.config.ts && vitest run --config vitest.config.ts
